## What is dialectR?

dialectR is an R package for doing dialectometric analyses in the style of Gabmap. For the moment, more detailed documentation on its use can be found in the vignettes folder.

## How do I download it?
```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("b05102139/dialectR")
```
